title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs locally with a single CLI and Docker-like model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async, supports streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM & chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android-friendly, builder-style API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat & generate.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; chat history, syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat UI for Ollama with Tailwind and Markdown support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack with Ollama, WebUI, GPU support & OpenWebUI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A & summarization.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; async client using reqwest.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama into mobile & desktop apps.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; minimal dependencies, cross-platform.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.
